categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you want a smarter kid, teach your child to read as early as possible and instill in them a love for books.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: As soon as they can read, they can teach themselves and that will be a life-long advantage over their peers who don't have that same ability.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If a family member gets diagnosed with dementia or Alzheimer's disease, in the early stages try to find out what their favorite songs of all time are.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: In this way you would be able to create a playlist for them that could be of great benefit in the later stages of the disease.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Strict parents can turn their kids into more effective liars because children who are afraid to tell the truth learn more deceptive behaviors to avoid getting in trouble.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Set reasonable rules and expectations for your child.
categoryContent.paragraphThree: Reward positive behavior and accept mistakes as a chance for learning.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Many problems in marriage are really just problems with being a bad roommate.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Learn how to be a good roommate, and it will solve many of the main issues that plague marriages.
categoryContent.paragraphThree: This includes communicating about something bothering you before you get too angry to communicate properly.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Your family would rather get a phone call from you at 3AM needing a lift, than a phone call from the Police at 4AM finding out you didn't make it home safely.
You shouldn't shield your children from a challenging life.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: By doing so, you will inadvertently unprepare them for the struggles that come with the realities of life.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you raise your children to enjoy helping you bake and cook in the kitchen, they are less likely to be picky eaters.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: They will be more inclined to try a wider range of foods if they help prepare them.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Don't ask a married couple when they are going to have kids.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: They might not be able to and you'll ruin their day bringing up sad thoughts.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you're taking care of children, always make bed time special and safe.
Just because you’re related to someone, doesn’t mean you have to love, or even like them.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: If someone doesn’t respect you, don’t be fooled into respecting them because they’re a relative.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Need to divide something fairly between kids?
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Get one of them to divide, and the other person gets first pick.
